data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهُ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word مَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (taht) Particle: that which is below; the lower part;. beneath; inferior, slop; declivity of a mountain; under. It. is the opposite of fawq/above.This particle has been used. about 51 times in al quran.
data.sentence: The word تَحْتِهَا comes from the root ت ح ت and is associated with the meanings: (taht) Particle: that which is below; the lower part;. beneath; inferior, slop; declivity of a mountain; under. It. is the opposite of fawq/above.This particle has been used. about 51 times in al quran.

data.meanings: to cause stream to flow, repulse, reproach, flow abundantly, drive back, brow beat, chide, do in the day time, day, daytime, daylight hours (from dawn to dusk).
data.sentence: The word الْأَنْهَارُ comes from the root ن ه ر and is associated with the meanings: to cause stream to flow, repulse, reproach, flow abundantly, drive back, brow beat, chide, do in the day time, day, daytime, daylight hours (from dawn to dusk).

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِيهَا comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.
data.sentence: The word الْمُتَّقِينَ comes from the root و ق ي and is associated with the meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.

data.meanings: to abide constantly, stay in (a place), remain, everlasting.
data.sentence: The word عَدْنٍ comes from the root ع د ن and is associated with the meanings: to abide constantly, stay in (a place), remain, everlasting.

data.meanings: Pay/give/render a satisfaction, make sufficient, pay a debt, to contend, repay/requit/compensate, to recompense.
data.sentence: The word يَجْزِي comes from the root ج ز ي and is associated with the meanings: Pay/give/render a satisfaction, make sufficient, pay a debt, to contend, repay/requit/compensate, to recompense.

data.meanings: veiled/concealed/covered/hid/protected (e.g. cloth, armour, grave, shield), invisible, become dark/posessed, darkness of night, bereft of reason, mad/insane/unsound in mind/intellect, confusedness.Become thick/full-grown/blossom, herbage, garden.Spiritual beings that conceal themselves from the senses (including angels), become weak and abject, greater part of mankind, devil/demon, people who are peerless having no match or equal, a being who is highly potent, sometimes refers to Kings because they are concealed from the common folk
data.sentence: The word جَنَّاتُ comes from the root ج ن ن and is associated with the meanings: veiled/concealed/covered/hid/protected (e.g. cloth, armour, grave, shield), invisible, become dark/posessed, darkness of night, bereft of reason, mad/insane/unsound in mind/intellect, confusedness.Become thick/full-grown/blossom, herbage, garden.Spiritual beings that conceal themselves from the senses (including angels), become weak and abject, greater part of mankind, devil/demon, people who are peerless having no match or equal, a being who is highly potent, sometimes refers to Kings because they are concealed from the common folk

data.meanings: to enter, got in, passed, to penetrate, breach, break through, invade, come upon, visit, intrude, meddle, insert, introduce, to participate/commence/include/take part, it became comprehended/comprised in it, mix/intermingle.. Have intercourse with, go into (one's wife).. Income/revenue/profit.. confused/badness/unsound/corrupt, vice, deceit/guile/circumvention.. A select group of close associates.. A place of entrance, gate, ingoing, instrument allowing entrance, key.. Guest.
data.sentence: The word يَدْخُلُونَهَا comes from the root د خ ل and is associated with the meanings: to enter, got in, passed, to penetrate, breach, break through, invade, come upon, visit, intrude, meddle, insert, introduce, to participate/commence/include/take part, it became comprehended/comprised in it, mix/intermingle.. Have intercourse with, go into (one's wife).. Income/revenue/profit.. confused/badness/unsound/corrupt, vice, deceit/guile/circumvention.. A select group of close associates.. A place of entrance, gate, ingoing, instrument allowing entrance, key.. Guest.

data.meanings: to will/wish. shaiun (pl. ashyaa'un) - thing/matter, affair in any way, at all, what is willed or wished, aught, any extent. In direct objective case it is often used to denote the meaning "a little", "bit", "at all". Adverbially it means "in any way", "at all".
data.sentence: The word يَشَاءُونَ comes from the root ش ي ا and is associated with the meanings: to will/wish. shaiun (pl. ashyaa'un) - thing/matter, affair in any way, at all, what is willed or wished, aught, any extent. In direct objective case it is often used to denote the meaning "a little", "bit", "at all". Adverbially it means "in any way", "at all".
